items.text: slides one into the pads, tucked away to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, front-foot defense
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: stays in the crease and punches a length ball back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: full on off, defended back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: short of a length, tucked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle and leg, knocked towards midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: steps down and Mash drags the length back, manages to pull it away to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: short, wide, slashed away through point, sweeper cover gets around it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: hangs back and opens the face to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: just a tad short, clings onto it as he picks the length early and hammers a pull off the backfoot through midwicket. Fifty up
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, FOUR runs

items.text: flighted outside off, eases a single down to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: pushed towards mid-on and the bowler dives to stop it
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: shifts back and swats a length ball to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: pitched up on middle, pushed out to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length, minimal turn around off, pushed back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.preText: Matiur Rahman: "Afghanistan is developing in cricket faster than other team "
items.text: opens the face to a length ball and finds point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: full, angled into middle, pushes it out to cover and takes off for a single, dives to make his ground at the bowler's end
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: defended to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: short of a length, fourth-stump line, stays legside of it and punches down the ground. Nicely timed, so skips away to the boundary comfortably
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs

items.text: slower length ball outside off, squeezes it out to oint
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: swings wildly at a wide length ball and sends and edge flying through third man. Once-bounce to the man in the deep
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, stays back and punches to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: backs away and chops a cut to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: length, spins away outside off, drops it to point from the crease
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: comes down the ground and gets hit on the back pad. Hit outside the line of the stumps
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run
